headline: Ask HN: Scientific Study of HN flag dynamics
description:
Would there be any interest in a scientific study of the effectiveness of HN flagging, including:

  - false positives
  - false negatives
  - brigading
  - flagged topics vs off-HN contexts
  - flagged topic trends over extended time
  - content origin (domain, geo, org, author)
Pointers to prior research on distributed flagging and moderation would be welcome.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 对HN旗帜动态的科学研究
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 對HN旗幟動態的科學研究
description_zh-Hans:
是否有兴趣对HN标记的有效性进行科学研究，包括：

 -假阳性
  - 错误的否定
  - 伪装
  - 被标记的主题与非HN背景的对比
  - 被标记的主题在长时间内的趋势
  - content origin (domain, geo, org, author)
Pointers to prior research on distributed flagging and moderation would be welcome.
description_zh-Hant:
是否有興趣對HN標記的有效性進行科學研究，包括：

 -假陽性
  - 錯誤的否定
  - 偽裝
  - 被標記的主題與非HN背景的對比
  - 被標記的主題在長時間內的趨勢
  - content origin (domain, geo, org, author)
Pointers to prior research on distributed flagging and moderation would be welcome.
